review_text: Bug Off!. I used to be a bug buffet, but no more. This stuff works! Nice fragrance and lightweight. Highly recommend!

Easy to set up, easy to use. Cost and ease of use are fantastic.  So tired of paying for cable tv when there is nothing thing worth watching.  There are a few dislikes.  There is not a good TV guide and some channels are not obtainable without paying a subscription.
Almost Five Stars For Panasonic Headphones. Sturdy and extraordinary quality. Would have had five stars if there was a volume adjustor.  Love love love the color.

Ohhh A soft scrubby. I was surprised how well this cleaned.  Removed grease  from places I had trouble with before. Would love if it was a little larger, still, works wonders if you add a bit of cleaner or viviparous to sponge.  If you have reactions to cleanser because of odor or chemicals this is a must have.
Love these. These are the best

Poor Quality. This item is of such poor quality that I doubt that it will last much more than a month or two. Every time I use it I wonder that the hot water didn't cause it to melt.
1/2 of the cans do not spray!. We have purchased this twice, and both times, one bottle did not spray.
It works!!. My granddaughter wrote on our new countertop with a black sharpie. I was sick, but tried the magic eraser and it removed all of it.
a little rough for me. the cloth is huge, and a little rough for my skin
